attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want water transport from Slough to Blackfriars if it creates less environmental damage and is cheaper and quicker than overground transport.

If not then pls create a quicker, direct route from Slough to Blackfriars.


London has a long stretch of rivers and canals which it is not utilising for transport.

Also as people are cutting down on air travel, pls provide mobile meeting rooms on boats.
